Package com.carrentalsystem.controller

Interface ICustomerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerService
public interface ICustomerService
The ICustomerService interface defines the contract for customer-related operations in the Car Rental System.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCustomer(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String phoneNumber)
    Adds a new customer to the system.
    void
    listCustomers()
    Lists all the customers in the system.
    void
    updateCustomer(int customerID, String firstName, String lastName, String email, String phoneNumber)
    Updates the details of an existing customer.

  • Method Details

    • addCustomer

      void addCustomer(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String phoneNumber)
      Adds a new customer to the system.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The first name of the customer.
      lastName - The last name of the customer.
      email - The email address of the customer.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer.

    • listCustomers

      void listCustomers()
      Lists all the customers in the system.

    • updateCustomer

      void updateCustomer(int customerID, String firstName, String lastName, String email, String phoneNumber) throws CustomerNotFoundException
      Updates the details of an existing customer.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer to update.
      firstName - The updated first name of the customer.
      lastName - The updated last name of the customer.
      email - The updated email address of the customer.
      phoneNumber - The updated phone number of the customer.
      Throws:
      CustomerNotFoundException - if the customer is not found.
